actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 2582 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Security and Development Cooperation Act of 1980 to extend the authority of the African Development Foundation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the International Security and Development Cooperation Act of 1980 to extend the authority of the African Development Foundation until September 30, 1990. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1985 and 1986 to carry out the purposes of the African Development Foundation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Security and Development Cooperation Act of 1980 to extend the authority of the African Development Foundation, and for other purposes.
